com.faunadb.common

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faunadb.common.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The HTTP Connection adapter for FaunaDB drivers.

    Relies on Netty for the underlying implementation.

    The close() method must be called in order to release Connection I/O resources

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Connection.Builder
      A builder for the Connection instance.
      static class  Connection.JvmDriver

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static Connection.Builder builder()
        Returns a new Connection.Builder instance.
        Returns:
        a new Connection.Builder

      • newSessionConnection

        public Connection newSessionConnection(java.lang.String authToken)
        Creates a new Connection sharing its underneath I/O resources. Queries submitted to a session connection will be authenticated with the token provided. The close() method must be called before releasing the connection.
        Parameters:
        authToken - the token or key to be used to authenticate requests to the new Connection
        Returns:
        a new Connection

      • close

        public void close()
        Releases any resources being held by the Connection instance.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • getLastTxnTime

        public long getLastTxnTime()
        Get the freshest timestamp reported to this client.

      • syncLastTxnTime

        public void syncLastTxnTime(long newTxnTime)
        Sync the freshest timestamp seen by this client. This has no effect if more stale than the currently stored timestamp. WARNING: This should be used only when coordinating timestamps across multiple clients. Moving the timestamp arbitrarily forward into the future will cause transactions to stall.

      • get

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<io.netty.handler.codec.http.FullHttpResponse> get(java.lang.String path,

                                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Issues a GET request with no parameters.

        queryTimeout - the query timeout for the current request.

        a CompletableFuture containing the HTTP Response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the HTTP request cannot be issued.
